title: Diamond Floral Vanki - An Elegant Touch of Tradition
materials: adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds. The diamonds are graded VS clarity and near colorless (G-H range). Showcases meticulous craftsmanship with a smooth
features: A modern interpretation of the classic Vanki (armlet), this pendant features a graceful, floral motif with a symmetrical arrangement of diamond-studded ovals. The diamonds are pavé set for maximum brilliance, creating a seamless sparkle. Delicate gold detailing adds a touch of understated elegance.
colors: Primarily rose gold with the dazzling white sparkle of diamonds. The rose gold provides a warm and romantic contrast to the icy brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: Ideal for contemporary occasions like cocktail parties
or as a sophisticated addition to everyday wear. Its modern design also makes it suitable for fusion outfits during pre-wedding events like sangeet or mehendi.
description: This Vanki pendant seamlessly blends tradition with modern design, making it a versatile piece for the discerning woman. The exceptional diamond quality and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. Its delicate floral motif carries a sense of femininity and grace. A unique addition to any jewelry collection.
